title: Male Military Voice Clips Vol. I
description: A set of 120 phrases ideal for use for medieval knights, soldiers, officers, and modern military characters.
longDescription:
A set of 120 phrases ideal for use for medieval knights, soldiers, officers, but also modern military characters.

technicalDetails:
Features: 120 stereo .wav sound effects.


Files Included:

Arrows 1-2, At Once 1-3, Charge 1-7, Crush Them 1-5, Defeat 1-3, Easy Boy, Fall Back 1-4, Flank Exposed 1-4, Flanks, Follow Me 1-2, Forward 1-3, If That’s Your Demand 1-3, It’s Been Hit 1-2, Keep Your Formation 1-3, My Horse 1-2, My Horse Has Been Hit 1-3, Not Yet 1-3, Now 1-4, Ready 1-5, Ready Your Horses 1-4, Reform 1-3, Retreat 1-4, Ride 1-3, Shield Wall 1-2, Shields Up 1-2, They’re All Dead 1-2, To Arms 1-4, To Battle 1-3, Turn, Turn Now 1-3, Understood 1-4, Victory 1-2, Victory Is At Hand 1-2, Victory Is Ours 1-3, We Are Victorious 1-5, We Broke Their Formation 1-3, We Cannot Hold Them 1-2, We Overpowered Them 1-2, We Trampled Our Enemy, We’ll Break Their Bones 1-3, You Heard The Order 1-2


Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 2:49

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
